en.title: Shop Overlay:

randomItem.name: A random item
randomItem.info: You will recieve a random item (Weapon / Armor / Misc or Potion) among all those existing in the game.

healAlterations.name: Heal alterations
healAlterations.info: Your status will be reset and you will be back on your road immediately.

regen.name: Complete health regeneration
regen.info: You will be fully healed but your status will stay unchanged.

badge.name: "MoneyMouth" Badge
badge.info: You will receive the badge in the hours following your payment. For more information on badges, use the command `help badges`

guildXp.name: Some xp for your guild
guildXp.info: You will receive a random amount (between 50 and 450) of guild xp.

error.alreadyHasItem: You already have the "MoneyMouth" badge. You can only buy it once.

potion.info: You will receive a potion and have to choose to keep it or not. If you already have the same potion, it will be destroyed without refund!

multipleChoice.warning: Choose the amount to buy. By clicking on the reactions you confirm the transaction !
